nodes.text: Bryan Young is a writer and contributor to the Official Star Wars Blog, the co-host of the Full of Sith Podcast and has written for Star Wars Insider.

He was inducted as an Honorary Friend of the 501st legion by Albin Johnson and Janine Spendlove at Dragon*Con 2009 for his contributions to Star Wars. He was inducted to the Rebel Legion as an Honorary Member at Salt Lake City Comic Con in September 2013, again for his contributions to Star Wars.
